Steve Freeman wrote:
> Hope it works out for you. We've been pretty negligent in terms of
> providing doc, but that's the price of keeping the day job ;-). In the
> meantime J.B. is providing good cover.

It's a shame I didn't discover jMock sooner. It could have been in the 
book, rather than EasyMock. :)

Still, it would be worthwhile rewriting a couple of recipes to use 
jMock, once the thing has come up. Steve, feel free to remind me to do 
that, sometime in September. :)
